title: GT4 Message Level Security User's Guide

section.title: Introduction
section.para: The main user issues for this component deal with configuring credential related settings. There are multiple mechanisms fordoing this:

listitem.simpara: Command line options (these are application specific)
Relying on default behavior. The only default behaviors available concern the proxy file and trusted certificates locations.

section.para: More information on these mechanisms can be found in the public interface guide.
